question: Mughal commander Abul Fazl invaded Ahmednagar in which of the following years?
explanation: Abul Fazl, a Mughal commander, invaded Ahmednagar in 1600 CE. The task of organizing resistance devolved on Chand Bibi bit in spite of her heroic efforts to overcome Mughal aggression, she was forced to purchase peace by ceding Berar to the Mughals.
